paper_abstract: this paper, a new way of obtaining second order Hakuhara derivative is introduced. The theorems to apply this way are approved. Then, the parametric form of fuzzy numbers is applied to solve two types of fuzzy H-differential equations of second order with constant multipliers and fuzzy initial values. Their solutions are classified and discussed hereinafter.
paper_title: Fuzzy generalized H-differential and applications to fuzzy differential equations of second-order
